ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Warm chocolate syrup and peanut butter together, then cool slightly before pouring over ice cream sandwiches
Assemble in advance and freeze for at least 4 hours or overnight for proper setting
Allow to sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving for easier cutting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Suggest variations with different ice cream flavors and help the user understand timing for serving this make-ahead dessert.
